hero.summary: Specialized in scalable web solutions using Python and React. Proven track record in document automation and enhancing educational platforms with AI.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Dynamic Full-Stack Developer specialized in scalable web solutions using Python and React. I have a proven track record in document automation and enhancing educational platforms with AI. My collaborative problem-solving skills and application of software development best practices ensure robust and sustainable code.

fullstack.0: Experience in web development with NestJS, React and Python applying modular architecture and object-oriented design.
fullstack.1: Built an educational platform with AI integration and interactive features.
fullstack.2: Focus on scalability, API optimization and development best practices.
fullstack.3: Developed Python solutions focused on generative AI, object-oriented programming and PDF manipulation.
fullstack.4: Implemented features for automated generation of academic documents.
fullstack.5: Worked on flow automation and support for scientific research projects.

backend.0: Practical experience in developing web applications using React, NestJS and TypeScript, as well as APIs and microservices.
backend.1: Solid experience in Python development and working with artificial intelligence applied to system integration using NestJS.
backend.2: Familiarity with object-oriented backend (OOP), database optimization and building scalable solutions.

items.title: 2nd Place - Hackathon Jovem Programador 2022
items.description: Awarded an Alexa device as prize for innovative software solution

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: These projects highlight my technical skills and problem-solving abilities in real-world applications.

degrees.title: Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems
degrees.description: Programming fundamentals, OOP, software engineering, SOLID, Java, HTML, CSS, relational databases - MySQL and non-relational - MongoDB, UML and information governance.

courses.title: Python 3+ Basic to Advanced
courses.description: PySide6, Django, Selenium, Regexp, Testing, TDD, OOP, GoF Design Patterns, algorithms and programming.
